oshiSkill.name: パソコンならわかるのら
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Reveal 1 Item with 「PC」 in its name from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

spOshiSkill.name: ルーナイト集合
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] May only be used if your Center holomem is <Himemori Luna>: Reveal 1-4 <Luknights> from your deck and attach them to your holomems in any way you like. Then shuffle your deck.

oshiSkill.name: poi
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn). Return 1 Cheer from archive to your own back <Shishiro Botan>

spOshiSkill.name: 狙撃
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per game) You may use this when your center Holomen is Green : Deal 100 Special Damage Opponent's Center Holomen other then Debut.

oshiSkill.name: 35P帰ってくるのかッ！？って！
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] You may roll a dice. If the result is 1, 2, 4, or 6, return a 35P from your Archive to your hand. If the result is 3 or 5, return 2 35Ps from your Archive to your hand.

spOshiSkill.name: あきらめない心にぇ
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Can be used if your Center holomem is Red: Choose any number of cards from your hand and place them on the bottom of your Deck in any order. Then draw from your Deck until you have 5 cards in your hand.

oshiSkill.name: モコちゃん！
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Send the top card of your Cheer Deck to one of your 1st Bloom holomems named Mococo Abyssgard..

spOshiSkill.name: BAU BAU!
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] Choose one of your holomems with #Advent. That holomem's Arts may target your opponent's Back holomems until the end of this turn.

oshiSkill.name: デビルズヴォイス
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] The Arts of your Center and Collab holomems with #Song gain +20 power until the end of the turn.

spOshiSkill.name: 悪魔的所業
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game]  Can be used during your opponent's turn when your Tokoyami Towa is Downed: return 2 Cheers from your opponent's Center holomem and 2 Cheers from their Collab holomem to the bottom of their Cheer Deck in any order.

oshiSkill.name: 無限の体力
oshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) Unrest one of your Resting holomems named [Inugami Korone].

spOshiSkill.name: ウォウウォウウォウウォウ
spOshiSkill.description: (Once per turn) You may use this when your Yellow holomen is down : Can be used when one of your Yellow holomems is Downed: move one of that holomem's Cheers to one of your other holomems, then return one of that holomem's stacked holomems (including the top holomem) to your hand.

oshiSkill.name: Member sheep いらっしゃい！
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Reveal 1 Fan from your Deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your Deck.

spOshiSkill.name: わためは悪くないよねぇ？

oshiSkill.name: ホロライブID一家
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Can be used when one of your holomems with #IDGen1 is Downed: draw a card.

spOshiSkill.name: がんばり～リス！
spOshiSkill.description: [Once per game] The Arts of all of your holomems named Ayunda Risu gain +50 power until the end of this turn.

You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

name: Luknight
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is about to take damage, you may Archive this Fan to reduce that damage by 30. This Fan may only be attached to your Himemori Luna, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: SSRB
ability: When the holomem with this Mascot attached Archives Cheer as part of their Ability or Arts, you may Archive this Fan instead of one Cheer. This Fan may only be attached to your Shishiro Botan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: 35P
ability: When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Red Cheer.When the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, your opponent may draw 1 card from their Deck.This Fan may only be attached to your Sakura Miko, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Haaton
ability: When you roll dice as part of the Abilities or Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached, you may Archive this Fan for the following effect: re-roll all dice rolled as part of this ability. This Fan may only be attached to your Akai Haato, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Ruffians
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may send 1 Blue Cheer from your Archive to one of your holomems named Fuwawa Abyssgard. This Fan may only be attached to your Fuwawa Abyssgard or Mococo Abyssgard, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Roboser
ability: When the holomem with this Fan attached uses an Art, this Fan is treated as 1 Purple Cheer.The Arts of the holomem with this Fan attached lose -10 power.This Fan may only be attached to your Robocosan, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Koronesuki
ability: The Baton Pass Cheer cost of the holomem this is attached to is reduced by 1.This Fan may only be attached to your Inugami Korone, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem..

name: Watamate
ability: During your opponent's turn, when the holomem with this Fan attached is Downed, you may move 1-2 Yellow Cheers from that holomem to another of your holomems named Tsunomaki Watame. This Fan may only be attached to your Tsunomaki Watame, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

name: Risuners
ability: (Once per turn) When the holomem with this Fan attached received Cheer, their Arts gain +10 power until the end of this turn. This Fan may only be attached to your Ayunda Risu, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
